name: The Library of Babel (LePatouPolaire, Philiuss, martoblob)
name_original: The Library of Babel (LePatouPolaire, Philiuss, martoblob)
description:
Taking place in a world inspired by the eponymous short story written by Jorge Luis Borges, The Library of Babel is a top-down 2D Rogue-Lite where the player navigates a number of dangerous rooms.

The Player wears bracelets which can socket in runes. Experimenting with different combinations of runes and bracelets can lead the player to cast powerful spells with a variety of effects.

The game is a school project and was made in 4 months, almost all assets are ours, those who aren't where legitimately bought on itch.

We hope you enjoy our little project and feel free to comment and make suggestions to better the game ! 

! The game is meant to be played with a controller !

Edouard, Martin and Philippe

P.S. There is still some bugs to iron out, a new version should be uploaded this week!
